```{r}
#devtools::install_github("wmurphyrd/fiftystater")
library(fiftystater)

sf_fifty <- sf::st_as_sf(fifty_states, coords = c("long", "lat")) %>% 
  group_by(id, piece) %>% 
  summarize(do_union=FALSE) %>%
  st_cast("POLYGON") %>% 
  ungroup()

plot(sf_fifty["id"])

sf_fifty <- sf::st_as_sf(fifty_states, coords = c("long", "lat")) %>% 
  group_by(id, piece) %>% 
  summarize(do_union = FALSE) %>%
  st_cast("POLYGON") %>% 
  ungroup()
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot() +
  theme_minimal() +
  geom_sf(data = sf_fifty)
```
